description: Miniature from Boethius, Consolation de philosophie; Coëtivy Master (Henri de Vulcop?) (French, active about 1450 - 1485), Anicius Manlius Severinus Boëthius (called Boethius) (Italian, about 480 - 524/526), Jean de Meun (French, about 1240/1260 - 1305); Paris, France; 1460 to 1470; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 7.3 × 17 cm (2 7/8 × 6 11/16 in.); Ms. 42 (1); J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
